_comment: Prediction configuration for ACE Pelican error code model

_suppression_notes.9999: Generic field repair - manual intervention, not predictable from message structure
_suppression_notes.9490: Fee code updated - requires fee directory lookup, not predictable from message alone

high_threshold_codes._comment_8xxx: Validation errors - higher threshold for codes prone to false positives
high_threshold_codes._comment_9xxx: Repair codes - higher threshold for directory-dependent or complex codes

9018_features: intm_entries_share_adr_bank_id - entries share same AdrBankID (strong signal)
intm_entries_share_bic_prefix - entries have similar BIC (same bank)
intm_has_redundant_info - composite: 2+ of above signals true
9024_features: intm_present - at least one intermediary exists
intm_has_multiple_types - different Type values (IBK, IB1) present
8026_features: id_has_bic_and_nch - compound ID contains both BIC and NCH patterns
nch_sources > 1 - multiple NCH sources could conflict
